    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82e9de4e7a74710aa9aabc5dcd7b7f1e76445dbd</entry>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82e9de4e7a74710aa9aabc5dcd7b7f1e76445dbd</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic force of attraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetische Kraft der Anziehung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force magnétique d'attraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força magnética da atração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza magnetica dell'attrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνητική δύναμη της έλξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza magnética de la atracción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates two ways of showing magnetic force of attraction between a north pole and south pole of two bar magnets.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei Möglichkeiten des 
Zeigens der magnetischen Kraft der Anziehung zwischen einem Nordpol 
und Südpol von zwei Stabmagneten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre deux voies de montrer 
la force magnétique de l'attraction entre un pôle du nord et le 
pôle de sud de deux barres aimantées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra duas maneiras de 
mostrar a força magnética da atração entre um pólo norte e um 
pólo sul de dois ímãs de barra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra due modi di mostrare 
la forza magnetica dell'attrazione fra un palo del nord e un polo del 
sud di due magneti della barra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει δύο τρόπους μαγνητική
δύναμη της έλξης μεταξύ ενός βόρειου πόλου και του νότιου 
πόλου δύο μαγνητών ράβδων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra dos maneras de mostrar 
la fuerza magnética de la atracción entre un Polo Norte y el poste 
del sur de dos imanes de barra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fängt auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetpole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nordpol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südpol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champs magnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pôles magnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pôle du nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poteau du sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campos magnéticos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força magnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólos magnéticos</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campi magnetici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poli magnetici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">palo del nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">palo del sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
